title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\PigJob
name: PigJob
description:
A Cloud Dataproc job for running Apache Pig queries on YARN.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.PigJob

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getQueryFileUri
methods.description:
The HCFS URI of the script that contains the Pig queries.

Generated from protobuf field string query_file_uri = 1;

methods.description:

Generated from protobuf field string query_file_uri = 1;

methods.name: getQueryList
methods.description:
A list of queries.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.dataproc.v1.QueryList query_list = 2;

methods.name: setQueryList
methods.description:
A list of queries.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.dataproc.v1.QueryList query_list = 2;

methods.name: getContinueOnFailure
methods.description:
Optional. Whether to continue executing queries if a query fails.

The default value is false. Setting to true can be useful when executing independent parallel queries.

Generated from protobuf field bool continue_on_failure = 3;

methods.name: setContinueOnFailure
methods.description:
Optional. Whether to continue executing queries if a query fails.

The default value is false. Setting to true can be useful when executing independent parallel queries.

Generated from protobuf field bool continue_on_failure = 3;

params.name: var

methods.name: getScriptVariables
methods.description:
Optional. Mapping of query variable names to values (equivalent to the Pig command: name=[value]).

Generated from protobuf field map<string, string> script_variables = 4;

Optional. Mapping of query variable names to values (equivalent to the Pig command: name=[value]).

methods.name: getProperties
methods.description:
Optional. A mapping of property names to values, used to configure Pig.

Properties that conflict with values set by the Cloud Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site.xml, /etc/pig/conf/pig.properties, and classes in user code.

Generated from protobuf field map<string, string> properties = 5;

methods.name: setProperties
methods.description:
Optional. A mapping of property names to values, used to configure Pig.

Properties that conflict with values set by the Cloud Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site.xml, /etc/pig/conf/pig.properties, and classes in user code.

Generated from protobuf field map<string, string> properties = 5;

params.name: var
params.description:
Optional. A mapping of property names to values, used to configure Pig.

Properties that conflict with values set by the Cloud Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site.xml, /etc/pig/conf/pig.properties, and classes in user code.

methods.name: getJarFileUris
methods.description:
Optional. HCFS URIs of jar files to add to the CLASSPATH of the Pig Client and Hadoop MapReduce (MR) tasks. Can contain Pig UDFs.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string jar_file_uris = 6;
